ISSUE.TITLE: issue in Morocco's data
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: please check the `translations `object: you have written مراكش as a value for `fa` but مراكش which is Marrakech in English it's a city in Morocco ``` translations: { br: "Marrocos" de: "Marokko" es: "Marruecos" fa: "مراکش" fr: "Maroc" hr: "Maroko" it: "Marocco" ja: "モロッコ" nl: "Marokko" pt: "Marrocos" } ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Updated native name for Luxembourg Fixing https://github.com/apilayer/restcountries/issues/221

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update Morocco translation for fa Fixes https://github.com/apilayer/restcountries/issues/186 Fixes https://github.com/apilayer/restcountries/issues/116
